title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error code 404 when a URL is accessed with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the server
4. Observe that the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error code 404.
